channel.title: [DELTA]How can I change text under member credit [DELTA]
channel.description:
So If anybody has ever heard of the source Pk Planet, thats what I'm using :D
I'm doing a lot of fixes to it and adding a lot of stuff but the one thing I cant find is the welcome screen where it says Thanks for joining Pk Planet. [img]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/5836/halpn.jpg[/img]
If you do know how to change this can you either post and tell me how to do it on this thread or PM me ;)
- Mikey :cool:

Found it

Thanks for trying to help anyway guys

item.title: [DELTA]How can I change text under member credit [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“mikeyboy09, post:5, topic:383657”]I searched every thing server sided using Z-FileSearcher… Its not there…

@sageofmali what file can i find that code in?

  • Mikey [/quote]

Did you just completely misread everything?

Go to client class and search for the login message, it will be under initialize() and near what he said.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA]How can I change text under member credit [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @fuery0w fuery0w
item.description:
@fuery0w wrote:

Go to Client.java and do CTRL+F and type the current welcome text. Im guessing its Welcome To Pk Planet . Or search ’ Welcome to’ then it will come up.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA]How can I change text under member credit [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

^What he said. It should be under: l33thax(12323); l33thax(7574); l33thax(7599); l33thax(7549); l33thax(8493); l33thax(7499);

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA]How can I change text under member credit [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Client class - ctrl + f - find it. If you’re out of luck try texthandler.

If you’re struggling and it isn’t download a keyword searcher.

Read full topic
